>🇨🇳 此主题已在Mac和Windows平台上测试，支持浅色和深色模式<br>🇬🇧 This theme has been tested on Mac and Windows platforms,it supports light and dark mode

# Typora foresee theme

![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Author-passwordgloo-blueviolet?logo=github&amp;style=flat")&emsp;![](https://img.shields.io/github/last-commit/passwordgloo/typora-foresee-theme?logo=Git)&emsp;![](https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?color=white&label=Passwordgloo&query=%24.data.totalSubs&url=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.spencerwoo.com%2Fsubstats%2F%3Fsource%3Dbilibili%26queryKey%3D394017572&labelColor=FE7398&logo=bilibili&logoColor=white)&emsp;![](https://img.shields.io/badge/麦田守望者-90-white?logo=zhihu&logoColor=white&labelColor=0084ff&amp;style=flat)&emsp;![](https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?color=white&label=%E7%BD%91%E6%98%93%E4%BA%91%E9%9F%B3%E4%B9%90&query=%24.data.totalSubs&url=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.spencerwoo.com%2Fsubstats%2F%3Fsource%3DneteaseMusic%26queryKey%3D1732207004&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&labelColor=d62f2e)

![](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/90091016/271819148-aa5cd28e-6876-4729-9865-e29001e1147c.png)中文  |   ![](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/90091016/271819155-72fe5b24-cd1c-4ceb-a32d-e559dbcaea63.png)[English](https://github.com/passwordgloo/Typora-foresee-theme/blob/study/Readme.md)

基于默认主题`night`修改

选中样式受 [typora-dyzj-theme](https://github.com/muggledy/typora-dyzj-theme) 启发

## 新功能
- 引用块样式支持渐变色
- 重新调整标题样式，添加专注模式下标题样式
- 使用 `scss` 优化原先的 `css`
- 在文件夹`badge`友情提供小图标

## 个性化

修改XXX-light(dark).css文件颜色代码制作自己的专属配色

```css
:root {
    --display: #666;
    --article: #FFF;
    --sidebar: #F2F2F2;
    --text-color: #323232;
    --theme-color: #FF8C00;
    --focus-color: #00CD66;
    --bg-color: var(--article);
    --primary-color: var(--theme-color);
    --rawblock-edit-panel-bd: var(--sidebar);
    --item-hover-bg-color: var(--theme-color);
    --control-text-hover-color: var(--theme-color);
    --font-family: "Microsoft YaHei", "Arial", "sans-serif";
}
```

## 如何使用

1. 克隆仓库,或者[下载压缩包](https://github.com/passwordgloo/Typora-foresee-theme/archive/refs/heads/study.zip)，国内用户访问不畅可通过[镜像网站](https://gitee.com/passwordgloo/Typora-foresee-theme/repository/archive/study.zip)下载
2. Typora依次打开菜单>主题，点击按钮`打开主题文件夹`
3. 复制粘贴到Typora主题文件夹

## 教程文档

访问[wiki](https://github.com/passwordgloo/Typora-foresee-theme/wiki/中文教程)了解使用教程

## 项目用途

*   归档个人学习经验
*   留下自己学习印迹
*   启迪他人思想火花
